price: 8. Zij kunnen niet luisteren naar de hogere groep (van engelen) want zij worden van alle kanten bekogeld.
arabic: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ وَيُقۡذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٖ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lā yassammaʿūna ilā al-mala-i al-aʿlā wayuq'dhafūna min kulli jānibin
